CPictureControl

A picture control.

This control extends CControl.  All basic properties and functions are implemented and documented in this class.

Summary
CPictureControlA picture control.
Properties
PictureThe picture can be changed by assigning a filename to this property.
PictureWidthThe width of the currently displayed picture in pixels.
PictureHeightThe height of the currently displayed picture in pixels.
Functions
SetImageFromHBitmapSets the image of this control.
Events
Introduction1) Use an event handler.
Click()Invoked when the user clicked on the control.
DoubleClick()Invoked when the user double-clicked on the control.

Properties

Picture

The picture can be changed by assigning a filename to this property.  If the picture was set by providing a hBitmap in SetImageFromHBitmap, this variable will be empty.

PictureWidth

The width of the currently displayed picture in pixels.

PictureHeight

The height of the currently displayed picture in pixels.

Functions

SetImageFromHBitmap

Sets the image of this control.

Parameters

hBitampThe bitmap handle to which the picture of this control is set.  Can also be hIcon if the control has a 0x3 style on creation.  This style is added automatically when a hIcon is used as Text on creation.

Events

Introduction

There are currently 3 methods to handle control events

1) Use an event handler.  Simply use control.EventName.Handler := “HandlingFunction” Instead of “HandlingFunction” it is also possible to pass a function reference or a Delegate: control.EventName.Handler := new Delegate(Object, “HandlingFunction”) If this method is used, the first parameter will contain the control object that sent this event.

2) Create a function with this naming scheme in your window class: ControlName_EventName(params)

3) Instead of using ControlName_EventName() you may also call CControl.RegisterEvent on a control instance to register a different event function name.  This method is deprecated since event handlers are more flexible.

The parameters depend on the event and there may not be params at all in some cases.

Click()

Invoked when the user clicked on the control.

DoubleClick()

Invoked when the user double-clicked on the control.

Basic control class from which all controls extend.
Sets the image of this control.
